name: DriftKing 2D
description:
Drift King is an endless Drifting game!
Just try to stay on the road!!
[Public Beta]

(DK2D Version 1.0)

  • Endless Mode
  • 4 biomes to explore.
  • 3 Cars to unlock.
  • Unlockable music.
  • 50 colors to unlock to change the color of your cars.
  • Additional missions to play during Endless mode.
  • Achievements
  • Play with Keyboard, Controller or by using a touch display.
  • Free updates. (Paid DLC will never happen!)
    /list]
